Description.value:
Work, Fight, Trade, Survive
Choose between 8 trade professions and collaborate with other survivors attempting to rebuild society. Buy and sell goods in your shop to supply the community with specialized resources that only You can obtain. Are you the Mechanic, the Reaper, the Scientist or the Cook? How will you support the village?
Invisible Dye credit: Haidr'Gna Increased Land Claim numbers credit: KhaineGB We started our modding adventure with Max Fox's XML Modding Tutorial series on youtube, and couldn't have made this mod without it. Throughout the process, Guppy's Unoffical 7dtd discord server has also been really helpful.

Author.value: Cozy Co. Co-op, aka Khym and Pesmax
